name: Mexican
description: Fine recipies from Mexico. Often use fresh herbs vegtables and Citrus and a combination of earthy and savory flavors

name: Italian

name: Chinese
description: often complimenting seasonal ingredients these dishes based on rice soup and a few others have amazing flavors thatll keep ypu coming back for more!
